short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right-click to search selected text with AI and access learning resources.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Summary

‚Ä¢ Discover an all-in-one browser extension designed to enhance your search experience! üåü
‚Ä¢ Access your complete search history to track and manage your queries effortlessly.
‚Ä¢ Filter results by keyword to quickly locate relevant information. üïí
‚Ä¢ Execute batch searches to handle multiple queries simultaneously, saving you time! üìö
‚Ä¢ Gain valuable insights with learning statistics, tracking your progress and completed tasks.
‚Ä¢ Customize your experience by adjusting your batch size for searches to fit your needs. üöÄ
‚Ä¢ Streamline your research process with organized and efficient tools.
‚Ä¢ Maximize your productivity and ensure you capture everything important.
‚Ä¢ Use this extension to make your learning journey smoother and more effective!
‚Ä¢ Don‚Äôt miss out on a more efficient way to learn and explore! üåê

Features

Your Search History
‚Ä¢ Description:
This section gives you access to your complete search history, allowing you to track and manage your queries over time.

‚Ä¢ How It Works:
- Filter by Keyword: Quickly locate specific queries by entering keywords to narrow down your history.
- Search History Table: View detailed information about each search, including:
‚ó¶ Timestamp: The date and time of your search.
‚ó¶ Query: The search term you used.
‚ó¶ Search With: The AI platforms utilized for your search (e.g., ChatGPT, Claude).
‚ó¶ Research Status: The current status of your search (e.g., Todo, Done).

‚Ä¢ Benefits:
Harnessing your search history empowers you to efficiently track your progress and access relevant information.
Say goodbye to the frustration of forgetting what you've searched for‚Äînow you can focus on building your knowledge and skills without losing valuable insights.

Batch Search
‚Ä¢ Description:
The Batch Search feature allows you to execute multiple queries simultaneously, streamlining your research process.

‚Ä¢ How It Works:
- Batch Search Content: Easily view a list of terms you want to investigate further.
- Action Button: Initiate a search for the entire batch with a single click.

‚Ä¢ Benefits:
Efficiently gather information on multiple topics at once, freeing up your time for more important tasks.
The ability to conduct batch searches means you can explore intricate topics quickly and expand your learning horizon significantly.

Learning Statistics
‚Ä¢ Description:
In this section, you can view valuable insights into your learning progress based on your search activity.

‚Ä¢ How It Works:
- Statistics Display: See how many unique search terms you've explored and how many research tasks you've completed.

‚Ä¢ Benefits:
Gaining insights into your learning journey allows you to identify areas for improvement and helps you celebrate your achievements.
Use this data to set personal learning goals, refining your research approach to maximize your educational experience.

Configuration
‚Ä¢ Description:
Customize your extension experience by adjusting the batch size for searches.

‚Ä¢ How It Works:
- Batch Size Selection: Choose the number of search terms to process in a single batch (1-50; recommended max: 20).
- Set Batch Size Button: Save your preferences for future searches.

‚Ä¢ Benefits:
Tailor your searching experience to fit your specific needs.
By adjusting the batch size, you can balance between efficiency and a deeper dive into your topics, ensuring an optimal workflow.
This flexibility means that whether you‚Äôre in a hurry or want to conduct an in-depth exploration, you've got the power to choose how you learn.
